sourcesContent:
import { useState } from "react"; export const UserCreate = ({ onClose, onUserCreate }) => { const [inputValues, setInputValues] = useState({ firstName: "", lastName: "", email: "", phoneNumber: "", imageUrl: "", city: "", street: "", streetNumber: "", }); const changeHandler = (e) => { setInputValues((state) => ({ ...state, [e.target.name]: [e.target.name].value, })); }; return (

Add User

First name should be at least 3 characters long!

Last name should be at least 3 characters long!

Email is not valid!

Phone number is not valid!

ImageUrl is not valid!

Country should be at least 2 characters long!

City should be at least 3 characters long!

Street should be at least 3 characters long!

Street number should be a positive number!

); };
